articles.description: The September quarter results of HUL, ITC, Nestle India and Colgate have thrown up some near-term headwinds, including increased competition and lower-than-expected consumption growth in some pockets, for the FMCG sector
articles.content:
Consumer staples companies have largely met Street expectations in the current earnings season, though a granular look at the numbers reveals some stress points in the sector.
Companies managements … [+6331 chars]
